changeSet.sql: UPDATE data_access_request AS dar SET collection_id = c.collection_id FROM dar_collection c WHERE ( CONCAT((dar.data #>> '{}')::jsonb ->> 'darCode', '-') ~* c.dar_code OR (dar.data #>> '{}')::jsonb ->> 'darCode' = c.dar_code ) AND dar.collection_id IS NULL AND dar.draft = false;
